summary: A coma sends an old man into his childhood's sinister fantasy world, where he must fight dementia and gain back his memories before it's too late.
cast: Francis X. McCarthy|Glenda Braganza|Helene Robbie|Ilkka Villi|Elias Toufexis|Victoria Jung|Kathleen Fee|Marianne Farley|Quinn Lord|Ron Lea|Joanna Noyes|Keyanna Fielding|Anette Olzon|Emppu Vuorinen|Marco Hietala|Jukka Nevalainen|Tuomas Holopainen|Alarey Alsip|Andrew Carter|Troy Donockley|Karl Werleman|Pierre-Antoine Lasnier|Greg Dunlevy|Shawn Baichoo|David Fiset|Marie-Christine Simoneau|Cynthia St-Amand|Kayla McKibbin|Stéphane Demers|Yannick Pierrehumbert|Yannick Melançon|Samuel Mercier|Samuel Paiemant|Philippe Bédard|Mathieu Girard|Kate McIninch|Lyne Riel|Madison McAleer|Maxime Marcil
title: Imaginaerum
